channel.title: Authors on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Academic

item.description: CURRENT WORK: 1) EO metrology 2) Monte-Carlo generation of ensemble fundamental climate data records 3) statistical analysis of ESA SST_CCI climate data records. RECENT WORK: machine learning and neural network driven models of global atmospheric aerosol mixtures, satellite-derived aerosol optical and microphysical parameters, high frequency ozone and biological-UV data for satellite product validation and trend analysis, and fast radiative transfer solvers for retrieval and global mapping of surface spectral solar radiation and UVI.
